conversations.value: Could you perform an in-depth analysis of this photo, including interleaved segmentation masks to map each part of your answer to specific image object?

This aerial image captures a post-wildfire scene characterized by vineyard rows on the left and scorched, rugged terrain on the right. Scattered across the landscape are multiple

destroyed buildings

[SEG], appearing as bright, off-white or gray patches of rubble and ash. A distinct group of debris is located in the upper right corner (940-1023px width, 0-160px height). On the left side, near the agricultural fields, two isolated ruins are visible (134-212px width, 308-514px height). The remaining structures are dispersed across the lower middle and right sections (380-944px width, 600-1010px height), all exhibiting the flattened, fragmented look of fire-ravaged structures.
